channel.title: PostgreSQL on FAN'S BLOG
channel.description: Recent content in PostgreSQL on FAN'S BLOG

item.title: PostgreSQL学习笔记1--PostgreSQL安装
item.description: 环境准备 1 2 [fan@MiWiFi-R1CM-srv ~]$ cat /etc/redhat-release CentOS Linux release 7.3.1611 (Core) 下载安装包 https://www.postgresql.org/ftp/source/ 1 wget https://ftp.postgresql.org/pub/source/v9.6.2/postgresql-9.6.2.tar.gz 安装PostgreSQL 安装依赖包 1 yum -y install coreutils glib2 lrzsz mpstat dstat sysstat e4fsprogs xfsprogs ntp readline-devel zlib-devel openssl-devel pam-devel libxml2-devel libxslt-devel python-devel tcl-devel gcc make smartmontools flex bison perl-devel perl-ExtUtils* openldap-devel
